system.availability: Those with  "Pure Faith" Talent gain +1 fate point that can be spent but not burned if posessing relic. If released, or contact made with infected individual (living or dead) make -30 Toughness Test (repeat every hour in proximity), if fail, 50% chance of infection. Detecting Disease requires -30 Medicae Test. If infected suffer 1d5 Toughness Damage per day it is uncured. Per 10 Toughness damage, make +20 Toughness Test, with 5 DoS cure self, if fail take 2d10 Rending damage (ignore toughness/armour). Toughness can't heal while infected. No known Cure, better try to make one... (See "The Folio Languor")
system.cost: Relic Poison/Disease. Holds religious significance to some, and death to the rest. Relics are unique, one of a kind items, they must be earned as opposed to acquired.
